name: Luma (Memodol)
description:
Some audio and performance issues on html version. For best experience download the files instead.

For Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 Theme: Stronger Together

Luma is a game about a fish finding companionship in the deep dark ocean. Control by moving your mouse, "call" with left mouse button, "strike" with right mouse button.

Will you be able to find hope in these dark times?
